caseTitle: Prof. Dr. Manzoor Hussain and others v. Dr. Zubaida Chaudhry and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: The officer nominated by the President under Section 14(4) of the Federal Ombudsmen Institutional Reforms Act, 2013 only processes the representations filed before the President. The decision-making powers of the President are not delegated to the said officer as the final decision on the representation is taken only by the President.
